--------------------
Text: A Walloon church (French: "Église Wallonne"; Dutch: "Waalse kerk") describes any Calvinist church in the Netherlands and its former colonies whose members originally came from the Southern Netherlands and France and whose native language is French.
Triplets:<A Walloon church
1:
--------------------
Text: Walloon church:  Members of these churches belong to the Walloon Reformed Church (French: "Réformé wallon"; Dutch: "Waals Hervormd" or, prior to 1815, "Waals Gereformeerd"), a denomination of the long-distinguished Dutch-speaking Dutch Reformed Church.
